title: Calories in In-N-Out Fries
meta_description: Discover in n out fries calories for a regular serving, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations like animal style.
assumptions: Regular serving of In-N-Out french fries, fresh-cut potatoes cooked in cholesterol-free vegetable oil, lightly salted; approximately 125 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, portion size, and customizations; values based on official In-N-Out data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A regular serving of In-N-Out fries contains 395 calories and 6 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal style (add cheese, grilled onions, spread)

faqs.q: How many calories in a regular In-N-Out fries?
What are the carbs in In-N-Out fries calories query?
faqs.a: 54 g total carbs, including 5 g fiber and 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out fries high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 295 mg sodium per serving, about 13% of daily value.

faqs.q: How does animal style affect In-N-Out fries calories?
faqs.a: Adds about 180 calories from cheese and toppings, totaling 575 kcal.

faqs.q: Do In-N-Out fries have trans fat?
faqs.a: No trans fat (0 g) due to cholesterol-free vegetable oil.
